SEARCH
Package cz.cvut.fel.pjv.bukovja4.utils.engine

Class Box<D extends Dim>

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.bukovja4.utils.engine.Box<D>
Type Parameters:
D - The dimension type for this box
public class Box<D extends Dim> extends Object
Represents a box in n-dimensional space with two corner points. Supports 2D, 3D, and 4D positioning with appropriate corner coordinate tracking.
See Also:
  • For positional representation of corners
  • The base dimensional interface

    • Box

      public Box(float x1, float x2, float y1, float y2, float z1, float z2, float special)
      Creates a box with specified coordinates in 4D space.

      x1 - First X coordinate
      x2 - Second X coordinate
      y1 - First Y coordinate
      y2 - Second Y coordinate
      z1 - First Z coordinate
      z2 - Second Z coordinate
      special - Fourth dimension coordinate

    • Box

      public Box(float x1, float x2, float y1, float y2, float z1, float z2)
      Creates a box with specified coordinates in 3D space. Fourth dimension (special) is set to 0.
      Parameters:
      x1 - First X coordinate
      x2 - Second X coordinate
      y1 - First Y coordinate
      y2 - Second Y coordinate
      z1 - First Z coordinate
      z2 - Second Z coordinate
      See Also:
      • For 4D box creation

    • Box

      public Box(float x1, float x2, float y1, float y2)
      Creates a box with specified coordinates in 2D space. Z and special dimensions are set to 0.
      Parameters:
      x1 - First X coordinate
      x2 - Second X coordinate
      y1 - First Y coordinate
      y2 - Second Y coordinate
      See Also:
      • For 3D box creation

    • Box

      public Box(Pos<D> first, Pos<D> second)
      Creates a box using two positions as corners. The dimension of the box is determined by the dimension type D.
      Parameters:
      first - First corner position
      second - Second corner position
      See Also:
      • For the position representation
